page.title: 13VILLAGE PEOPLE
page.content: {We interviewed Mrs. N. Robinson who, {at 59, is the wife of farmer Mr. P. {Robinson who is 61 years of age. Q: Where do you live? A: At Lodge Farm, Garvestone. Q: How long have you owned the farm? A: Ten years. Q: Which farm animals do you keep? A: Sheep and Cows all year and pigs in winter. Q: Do you deliver the the animals? A: Yes when they need help. Q: Does your daughter help on the farm? A: Only when she is at home. Q: Where were you born? A: At Dereham. Q: Where was your husband born? A: At Street Farm, Garvestone. Q: Have you noticed any changes in the village? A: Yes there have been many changes.
